app.name: KARDont
app.long_description:
Based on Nintendon't by FIX94 and crediar.
KARDont't Github: https://github.com/SeanMott/KARDont Warp Star Project Breakdown: [put link here] KAR Workshop Website: [put link here]
KARDon't allows you play KAR and it's mods on a Wii or Wii U from an SD or HDD device.
